text: José Greci (10 January 1941 – 1 June 2017) was an Italian movie, television and stage actress. She made her movie debut in 1959, playing the Virgin Mary in William Wyler's Ben-Hur. Greci studied at Silvio D'Amico National Academy of Dramatic Art. Greci died in Rome, Italy on 1 June 2017, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors
title: José Greci
